bio.intro: Hi! I'm Ammar Hussain Ahmed, a detail-oriented Frontend Developer & IT Support Specialist (First Class Honors, Umm Al-Qura University, GPA 3.8/4). I'm passionate about building high-quality, interactive user experiences using modern frameworks like React.js and Next.js while maintaining clean, maintainable code within collaborative environments.
bio.experience: My professional experience includes working as a Technical Support Specialist with Qatarat App, a backend internship at iDara.NET, and roles in data entry operations. I've developed a strong foundation in both frontend technologies (JavaScript ES6+, HTML5, CSS3, React, Next.js, Tailwind CSS) and backend systems (Node.js, PHP, MySQL). I'm always eager to apply strong skills in JavaScript, HTML/CSS to build/fix UI components and continuously expand my technical knowledge.
bio.conclusion: I'm proud of my achievements, including being the Second Winner in the Smart Makkah Hackathon, and completing specialized courses in JavaScript, Data Analysis, and Python. I bring excellent communication skills, problem-solving abilities, and work well under pressure. Let's connect and see how my technical expertise and collaborative approach can help your organization succeed!

education.title: Education
